concept.label: first-question
concept.phrase: Why did you do "%i%" here?
Why did you perform "%i%" here?
Please explain why you applied "%i%" here?
What part of the equation made you apply "%i%" now?
What part of the equation inspired you to apply "%i%" here?
What made you choose "%i%" as the correct step?
Among subtract/add/divide/multiply, why did you choose "%i_opr%" here?
How did you know we should %i_opr% "%i_op%" and not something else?

concept.label: R2Y-response-simst
concept.phrase: Fantastic! Thanks!
That's a helpful response. Thanks!
Perfect! You are one of the best teachers I had so far!
Makes perfect sense to me. Thank you!
Genius! That helped a lot!
Sweet! Explanation right on spot!
Thanks for explaining using the key terms. That’s very helpful!

concept.label: R2N-response-simst
concept.phrase: I am looking for an in-depth answer. Can you explain why "%i%" works using the key terms in the Unit Overview section?
I am trying to understand in-depth. Using the key terms from Unit Overview, can you explain why you %i_opr%ed "%i_op%" here and not something else?
I am thinking deeply about your suggested step. Can you explain why %i% works using the key terms from Unit Overview?
Looking back at your suggested step, I was wondering if you can explain why "%i_opr%" is the best way to go using the key terms from Unit Overview?

concept.label: R1Y-response-simst
concept.phrase: Thanks for describing it so thoughtfully!
Thanks for the witty response!
Thanks for explaining it to me so wisely!
Your explanation was right on spot!

concept.label: R1N-response-simst
concept.phrase: Please explain what went wrong using key terms in the Unit Overview section.
How did you figure out that something went wrong? Please explain using key terms in the Unit Overview section.
Please explain what went wrong using key terms from the Unit Overview section.
Please describe what went wrong using key terms from the Unit Overview section.

concept.label: R0-response-simst
concept.phrase: I am trying to understand what makes "%i%" correct in depth. Would you please explain using key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview section?
Using key terms used in algebra (from the Unit Overview section), explain why you chose "%i_opr%" and not any other transformations?
I attempt to learn things deeply so that I can solve any equation. What makes "%i%" correct at this point of an equation?
I want to strengthen my basic understanding. What motivated you to demonstrate "%i%"?
I want to solidify my basics. What motivated you to demonstrate "%i%"?
Using the key terms in the Unit Overview section, explain why you performed "%i%" ?

concept.label: R0-response-simst-2
concept.phrase: Can you explain why "%i%" is your first guess using the key terms from the Unit Overview section?
Today is my day to learn from you. Can you explain why "%i%" is your first guess using the key terms from the Unit Overview section?

concept.label: move-on
concept.phrase: Hmm...I did not fully understand your statement, but let’s move on!
Umm...although I am not entirely sure, let’s move on!
Although I am not sure what you meant, let’s move on!
Okay! Let’s move on although I’m still confused.

concept.label: unanticipated-response
concept.phrase: Okay!
Alright!
